Class CustomerDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbdao.CustomerDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO

    public class CustomerDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO
    The class CustomerDBDAO is part of myCouponProject the class CustomerDBDAO communicates between the CustomerFacade and SQL
    Author:
    Oshra & Shilo
    See Also:
